name: The Right Way to Drive
description:
The Right Way to Drive is my entry to GMTK Jam 2019

It's a racing game, but you can't not accelerate, you cannot brake, you can only steer to the right.

Properly timestamped online version is here, didn't figure out how to upload both HTML5 and downloadable versions simultaneously fast enough

D is the only gameplay related key

Made in Godot, using Rubik font by  Philipp Hubert and Sebastian Fischer

Graphics, music and sound effects made by me
